name: Somleng
description: An adhearsion application compatible with Twilreapi

AHN_CORE_USERNAME.description: Required. This should match the configuration in your rayo.conf.xml

AHN_CORE_PASSWORD.description: Required. This should match the configuration in your rayo.conf.xml

AHN_CORE_HOST.description: Required. This should match the configuration in your rayo.conf.xml

AHN_ADHEARSION_DRB_HOST.description: Required. The hostname of the DRb service

AHN_ADHEARSION_DRB_PORT.description: Required. The port number of the DRb service

AHN_TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Required. This should match the auth token you have set up on the client application

AHN_SOMLENG_DEFAULT_DIAL_STRING_FORMAT.description: Optional. The dial string format. The interpolated values will be replaced at runtime

AHN_SOMLENG_DEFAULT_DIAL_STRING.description: Optional. The dial string. The interpolated values will be replaced at runtime

AHN_TWILIO_STATUS_CALLBACK_METHOD.description: Optional. Make a request to the AHN_TWILIO_STATUS_CALLBACK_URL using this HTTP method when an incoming call is completed.

AHN_TWILIO_STATUS_CALLBACK_URL.description: Optional. Make a request to this URL when an incoming call is completed.

AHN_TWILIO_VOICE_REQUEST_METHOD.description: Optional. Retrieve and execute the TwiML using this HTTP method when an incoming call is received. Defaults to POST.

AHN_TWILIO_VOICE_REQUEST_URL.description: Required. Retrieve and execute the TwiML at this URL when an incoming call is received
